GSD.description:
mm/kmemleak: reset tag when compare object pointer

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.33 by commit 7d3bd683e0849f0ec52fefa8070734dedc3b33a1. For more details please see the references link.
